text: Magnolia is a 1999 American epic psychological drama movie written, directed and co-produced by Paul Thomas Anderson. It stars Jeremy Blackman, Tom Cruise, Melinda Dillon, Philip Baker Hall, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Ricky Jay, William H. Macy, Alfred Molina, Julianne Moore, Michael Murphy, John C. Reilly, Jason Robards and Melora Walters. Magnolia received positive reviews. Cruise was nominated for Best Supporting Actor at the 72nd Academy Awards, and won the award in that category at the Golden Globes of 2000. ==References== Category:1999 drama movies Category:1990s epic movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Thomas Anderson Category:American epic movies Category:American psychological movies Category:1990s American drama movies Category:Cancer in movies Category:Movies about death Category:Movies about depression Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about narcissism Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:1990s English-language movies Category:New Line Cinema movies Category:Incest in movies
title: Magnolia (movie)
